Price: $34.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:43:33 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Life Sutra aims to reach our diverse consumers, who may not have the time to access practical ways to implement growth-promoting psychoeducational resources, through our thoughtful and fun relationship-enhancing and educational games and tools.

Life Sutra Card Games

How did we get our start?

We launched Life Sutra to equip individuals, couples & families with practical psychoeducational games to empower their relationships and lives.

What makes our products unique?

Our easy-to-play card or board games distill what matters most in our relationships and lives from my extensive training in psychology. Every game play enriches you and your loved ones with life skills for success and happiness.

Why do we love what we do?

I love accelerating growth creatively. It naturally brings me great joy to do this through our games for our Life Sutra consumers too!

Dr. Tania Sharma, Ph.D., CRC

CEO – Life Sutra

Mission: To provide practical psychoeducation to individuals, couples and families to live better, engaged, meaningful, fun and connected lives.

Vision: To develop games and tools to enhance individual, couple and family relationships and Life skills.

Values: Access to practical psychoeducation for all; fostering receptive and connected relationships

Life Sutra Games

Best Gift for any Occasion

BEST CHRISTMAS GIFT FOR NEWLYWEDS – a fun way of entering married life, creating romantic and joyous memories through deep conversations and thoughtful activities
GET DEEP AND AFFECTIONATE – helps you discover new things about your partner through conversations on different topics across different life areas.
BACKED BY SCIENCE – Designed based on scientific and psychological techniques used in marriage counseling, with CBT, EMDR, and mindfulness
PREMIUM ANNIVERSARY GIFT – best quality, and elegant looking gift for your partner, with the use of FSC certified paper for sustainability in packaging. Our cards are printed with love and promote environment friendly products
BUSINESS WITH A HEART – Combine GREAT FUN along with heartwarming activities. Part of our profits from each game purchased is donated to Feeding America
FOR ANY OCCASION – couples toys – husband gift – marriage card game – married games – connect card – couple love – conversation cards couples – couple conversation starters – spouse games – couple question game – anniversary gift husband – best couples game – conversation cards – couples question cards – communication game – couples things – partner games – newlywed games – couple card games – couple activities – newlywed game – romantic couple


Read more





Talk, Connect & Share

Couple Connect game will help you generate thought provoking conversations that will strengthen and deepen your relationship.

Do, Act & Experiment

This card will also help you try behavioral techniques that will increase mindfulness, awareness and acceptance in your relationship

Game that Creates Special Moments

Deepen your bond holistically across 13 important life areas. It's a great tool for learning about each other, staying on the same page, and sharing ideas and feelings.

Read more


Couple Connect is a card game for couples with easy-to-follow instructions. The strategic game helps to deepen your connection, talk about things that are difficult to talk about, and reconnect in the best way possible.

Build trust, intimacy and reignite your romance. Couple Connect is a great tool for improving communication in your relationship.


A New Way to Connect

Write a new story about how you two communicate today

Build a deeper, emotional bond with your partner by asking meaningful questions & doing fun activities great for your relationship.


Spice it up - Rekindle the Romantic Spark

Try a variety of novel psychological techniques and feel your romantic moments more intensely.

Learn to re-program your mind and body to classify positive romantic moments as "sparks."


Feel Loved & Cherished

Couple Connect will help you discover how you both feel loved, cared for, and nurtured by each other.

When you play our game, you create a dedicated space in your day to deepen your bond, pay positive attention, and make each other feel special.


Enjoy Deeper Access to Your Partner

Every card you play gives you a doorway into your partner's thoughts and feelings.

Couple Connect can help you communicate with your partner in novel ways that you may not have tried before.


WHY


EVERYONE


LOVES


THIS GAME


Couple Connect Couple Reconnect Dating Connect Social Genius Bulls & Bears Board Game
Discover Life Sutra Games For couples who have been together less than 10 years and want to strengthen their bond For Couples who have been together for 10+ years and want to rekindle Romantic Spark Game for singles who want to master the Art of Dating Family Game to master Social Skills and boost confidence Family Game to Master Personal Finance & Investments
Players 2 2 1 - 2 2 - 6 2 - 6
Play Time 15 - 90 min 15 - 90 min 15 - 90 min 30 - 90 min 30 - 90 min
Designed by Psychologist
Premium Gift
Game Type Card Game Card Game Card Game Card Game Board Game

(as of Nov 30,2022 10:36:56 UTC – Details)

From the manufacturer

New Sprouts Fix It!

Give your little fixer everything they need to complete pretend construction and repair jobs with New Sprouts Fix It!, one of the popular pretend play activity sets from Learning Resources!

Pretend Tools for Little Hands!

Sized for little hands, this set’s five toddler-safe tools include a pretend saw, screwdriver, hammer, wrench, and drill!

Imaginative Fix-It Adventures!

Made from chunky plastic, these pretend tools add a touch of realism to all kinds of imaginative playthe drill even makes noise!

Toolbox for Storage!

When repairs are finished for the day, all of the tools store safely inside the included tool box until the next game of pretend.

Ages & Stages

Imaginative Skills

Let imaginations soar with this toy that builds creativity and social skills through immersive role play!

Hand Strength

Give little hands the strength they need to hold a pencil, play on the playground, and more with this fun hands-on toy!

Social Skills

Kids develop social-emotional learning skills with this toy’s fun activities that support healthy emotions and communication!

Building Someone Amazing

When the toy you choose is from Learning Resources, you’re helping your child build who they will become – whether an architect, an A student, or just an all-around awesome kid!

TOY TOOLS: Little tools for big imaginary projects. Surprise your children with this toddler tool set
TODDLER-SAFE TOOLS: Encourage imaginative play with toddler-safe tools made from durable, soft plastic
TODDLER TOOLBOX INCLUDES: Includes saw, hammer, screwdriver, wrench, drill, and toolbox
REALISTIC SOUNDS: Squeeze the drill and it makes sounds
Give the Gift of Learning: Whether youre shopping for holidays, birthdays, or just because, toys from Learning Resources help you discover new learning fun every time you give a gift!
Kids’ Toys for Stocking Stuffers!: From fidget toys and board games to puzzles and beyond, our screen-free learning and education toys make the perfect Christmas gifts for boys and girls!

item.title: OLA ART Shut The Box Game Wooden for 2-6 Players, Wooden Board Table Math Game with 16 Dice, Board Game for Kids Adults, Family Classroom Home Party or Pub
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) What’s the SHUT THE BOX: Wooden shut the box game is a classic traditional dice game that offers endless fun. With a new upgrade that can be played by up to 6 player at same time, complete with 1 to 10 number combinations, 4 (wood) + 12 (colored plastic) dice, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:44:23 UTC – Details)



What’s the SHUT THE BOX: Wooden shut the box game is a classic traditional dice game that offers endless fun. With a new upgrade that can be played by up to 6 player at same time, complete with 1 to 10 number combinations, 4 (wood) + 12 (colored plastic) dice, it is one of the most popular math games
Origin of The Game: The history of this game is not much more than vague folklore — No one really knows when and where the game originated. It may have originated in Normandy, France around the 12th Century. It is believed to have been a popular game amongst fur trappers of the Hudson Bay Company in the 19th Century. It is said to have also been popular among sailors and fishermen. This centuries old game is great for teaching kids basic addition and subtraction. It helps to build mental math skills and is really fun to play
Endless Fun for Every OccasionThis classic pub game is a great addition to any game night of holiday get-together! Gather your friends and family around this addicting dice game, and put your math and strategy skills to the test. Whether you make some friendly wagers or just play for fun, Shut the Box is sure to entertain
Premium Craftsmanship: The wooden shut the box game is made of solid natural wood which is durable and sturdy. Premium Felt ensure the lower noise when dice hit the board so that you can focus on the game and hours of fun while playing
Multiple Ways to Play: There are different ways of playing Shut the Box. Read the instructions or you find and learn about options online by searching How to Play Shut the Box or Shut the Box Game Variations.

4.5
Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:44:23 UTC – Details)

item.title: 3 Card Games, UNO, Phase 10, ONO 99, Gifts for Kids, Adults and Family Night, Storage Tin Box |Travel Games
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) In this exclusive tin full of fun, card lovers will find 3 exciting games from Mattel -the UNO Card Game, Phase 10 Card Game and ONO 99 Card Game. Each deck offers unique game play for a different experience:The UNO Card Game is about color and number matching, the Phase ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $16.99 - $15.20
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:44 UTC – Details)



In this exclusive tin full of fun, card lovers will find 3 exciting games from Mattel -the UNO Card Game, Phase 10 Card Game and ONO 99 Card Game. Each deck offers unique game play for a different experience:
The UNO Card Game is about color and number matching, the Phase 10 Card Game involves creating card series rummy-style and the ONO 99 Card Game challenges players to add cards up without hitting 99!
The 3 card games test a range of skills and let players either focus on one game or mix it up for a full night of friendly competition!
The decorative tin keeps the card decks and instructions neatly stored away when not in play.
Makes a great gift for houses that host kid, teen, adult or family game nights.

5
Price: $16.99 - $15.20
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:44 UTC – Details)

item.title: Fagomfer Kwumsy D1 PRO Real-time Ambient TV LED Backlight Kit with HDMI 2.0 Sync Box, Immersion Ambient Lighting Strips for 75-90 Inch TV, 15 Lighting Modes/4 HDMI Inputs/Handy Remote Control
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Wide compatibility: D1 PRO’s smart HDMI box has 4 HDMI ports, no need to repeatedly plug and unplug each multimedia, no matter which media you choose: TV, PC monitor, PS5, Switch or other devices with HDMI ports – Lights all change automatically with zero lag. And D1 PRO has no ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $209.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:34 UTC – Details)



Wide compatibility: D1 PRO’s smart HDMI box has 4 HDMI ports, no need to repeatedly plug and unplug each multimedia, no matter which media you choose: TV, PC monitor, PS5, Switch or other devices with HDMI ports – Lights all change automatically with zero lag. And D1 PRO has no video format restrictions, supports resolution 4K 60HZ (3860*2140P) input and output, Dolby DTS and other audio output.
Unmatched Color Accuracy: The D1 PRO uses an FPGA-based controller board and applies it to a light bar with ARGB LEDs, each light strip contains 60 ARGB LED beads per meter, ensuring it delivers vivid color reproduction every time. Through advanced AI programming, each LED light bead is intelligently controlled to provide stable, accurate, vivid and zero-lag color effects, which will provide extra light to the room while reducing eye strain when viewing in low light conditions pressure.
Personalization: D1 PRO has 15 light modes to immerse you in a visual wonderland and explore the infinite possibilities of lighting. It also comes with an easy-to-use remote, so you can change the color or brightness of the light whenever you want, depending on your mood or need, providing exciting lighting effects for music, videos and games.
Friendly Design and Easy to Use: We offer different sizes to match any screen from 32 inches to 120 inches, please buy as you need. At the same time, our LED light bar has a protective layer, which can be cut to the length you need along the dotted line according to your personal needs. All you need to do is plug the cable into the HDMI signal box and attach the strip to the back of the TV/Monitor screen to use (we come with the part to attach the LED strip).

5
Price: $209.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:34 UTC – Details)

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

});

Price: $64.99 - $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:26 UTC – Details)

Product Description

[ 5 Pack Christmas Lighted Gift Boxes ] 5 Pack lighted Christmas gift boxes with different size include super large: 10*10*12inch, large: 8*8*10inch, medium: 6*6*8inch, small: 5*5*7inch, mini: 4*4*6inch. Each gift box is matched with green, red, gold, silver and blue bows, designed with snowflake patterns, pine cones, red berries and pine needles.Copyright Certificated Model.
[ 80 LED Warm White Lights ] The 80 LED warm white lights inside can passes through the gift box, and reflected on the surface of the gift box, bringing you impressive glowing display effect.
[ Adapter Included ] Just plug and unplug it for power on and off. With 10 feet long lead wire, easy and convenient for outdoor use. The 4.5V-0.8A low voltage is not easy to heat, and it can be used safely.
[ Durable Materials & Compact Storage ] Constructed by sturdy metal frame and covered with yarn material, durable and reusable. They can be stacked one-by-one for compact storage, easy carrying and space saving.
[ Lighted Christmas Present Box Decor ] Suitable for outdoor and indoor Christmas decorations home, Christmas tree, fireplace, room, window, porch, front door, patio, small tree, bedroom, snow, yard, etc.





Read more




Price: $64.99 - $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:26 UTC – Details)

Price: $10.63
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:18 UTC – Details)


UNO is the classic family card game that’s easy to pick up and impossible to put down! Players take turns matching a card in their hand with the current card shown on top of the deck either by color or number. Special action cards, like Skips, Reverses, Draw Twos, color-changing Wild and Draw Four Wild cards, deliver game-changing moments as they each perform a function to help you defeat your opponents. If you can’t make a match, you must draw from the center pile. And when you’re down to one card, don’t forget to shout “UNO!” The first player to get rid of all the cards in their hand wins. Now card game-lovers can get UNO in a sturdy tin that’s great for travel and makes storage stress-free. Colors and decorations may vary.
UNO is the classic family card game that’s easy to learn and so much fun to play!
In a race to deplete your hand, match one of your cards with the current card shown on top of the deck by either color or number.
Strategize to defeat your competition with special action cards like Skips, Reverses, Draw Twos and color-changing Wild cards.
When you’re down to one card, don’t forget to shout “UNO!”
This fun family card game is perfect for adults, teens and kids 7 years old and up.


Classic UNO

UNO is the card game that’s easy to pick up and impossible to put down! All it takes to win is a little coordination between colors (red, green, blue, and yellow) and numbers. This fun family card game is takes only minutes to learn and is so much fun to play!

Read more


Make Your Match!

In this fun race to get rid of all your cards, players take turns matching one of their own cards with the card that appears face-up on the discard pile by either color or number. If you are unable to play a card from your own hand, you must retrieve a card from the draw pile.

Read more


Changing Moments

With 32 special action cardsSkips, Reverses, Draw Twos, Wild, and Draw Four Wildthe outcome of the game can shift at any moment! A color-changing Wild card can be played at any time to change the current suit color.

Read more


Call it Out!

Don’t forget to yell ‘UNO’ when you have but one card remaining! The first player to get rid of all their cards wins the game. UNO Tin is travel-friendly and makes storage stress-free.

Read more

5
Price: $10.63
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:18 UTC – Details)

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Technical Details Manufacturer jiaji Brand Jiaji Item Weight 1.66 pounds Product Dimensions 10.23 x 2.95 x 6.5 inches Item model number JJNM001 Manufacturer Part Number JJNM001 Special Features Seat gap storage, car seat organizer, car pockets, car seat storage box, car seat gap, car phone storage, seat gap, car seat storage, car storage, car seat ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Technical Details

Manufacturer jiaji
Brand Jiaji
Item Weight 1.66 pounds
Product Dimensions 10.23 x 2.95 x 6.5 inches
Item model number JJNM001
Manufacturer Part Number JJNM001
Special Features Seat gap storage, car seat organizer, car pockets, car seat storage box, car seat gap, car phone storage, seat gap, car seat storage, car storage, car seat gap filler, car seat side pocket, car seat gap storage box., Car seat organizer front seat gap filler, car seat gap organizer, car seat gap organizer front seat, seat gap storage box, car storage organizer front seat, car organizers and storage front seat, car seat;

Additional Information

ASIN B096VFKPLG
Customer Reviews

3.8 out of 5 stars

2,094 ratings

3.8 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #648 in Automotive (See Top 100 in Automotive)
#3 in Automotive Trays & Bags
Date First Available June 17, 2021

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $29.99 - $22.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:11:04 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Neat Little Holder!

This car seat gap organizer box can help you become a neat holder!

Look No Further For Your Keys

If you have problems losing things in your car seat gaps, the car seat organizer front seat storage box is for you. It not only prevents small items from falling between the seats but also gives you a place to put change, a pen, toll cards, and other necessary car items and keeps them within reach. It is well-constructed and easy to install. Safe and reliable.

High Quality

Made of premium top-class PU and ABS material which is durable and is impact resistant. Interior velvet material increases friction to keep items from sliding and rattling.

Look No Further For Your Keys

Adds CONVENIENCE & SPACE for your keys, cards, money, charger, phone, and cosmeticsreceipts. Interior velvet material increases friction to keep items from sliding and rattling.

Intimate Settings

These car gap filler organizers can make it easier for you to find the car items you need on the road. The precise fit of the design transforms the organizer into several high boxes with storage compartments. Make your Armrest console organized and looks much cleaner.

Easy To Install

These car seat gap fillers with cup holders can be easily washed with water. Besides, the installation is relatively simple, no tools required, installation car seat gap filler just inserts the between car seat gap filler and console, Can find a suitable position.

Specification:

Product Color: Black Main Material: Flocking materials, PU Leather, and ABS Plastic Suitable: Not was suitable for car seat gaps wider than 0.6 inches(1.5 cm) and central console lower than the seat. Package size (L*W*H): 11.22in x 6.92in x 4.17in Product Weight: 1.91lb Package Content: 1 x Left Storage box 1 x Right Storage box 1 x Microfiber Cleaning Cloth 2 x Car Back Seat Headrest Hooks

Say Goodbye to Mess – If you have problems on losing things in your car seat gaps, the car seat organizer front seat gap filler is for you. It prevents small items from falling between the car seat gap, gives you a place to put change, pens, toll cards, and other necessary car items and keeps them within reach.
New Version Car Seat Gap Filler – This car seat organizer has a good texture that feels like a baby’s skin that is fine and smooth. The car storage organizer front seat is made of high-quality black ABS plastic and PU leather that cannot break, slip, bend or leave any scratches. With a velvet material pads that can prevent items from sliding and rattling.
Fashion Design and Driving Safety – This front seat gap filler will help you create a neat and clean environment.This seat gap filler fits the car seat gaps. Because it will not shake when you brake suddenly, and it is not too big to waste your car seat space. The new design added red stitching which adds to the overall appearance. Make your car more outstanding among friends.
Perfect Size Car Storage Organizer- Not suitable for car seat gapswider than 0.78 inches(2 cm) and central console lower than the seat. Neat Little Holder!

This car seat gap organizer box can help you become a neat holder!

If you have problems losing things in your car seat gaps, the car seat organizer front seat storage box is for you. It not only prevents small items from falling between the seats but also gives you a place to put change, a pen, toll cards, and other necessary car items and keeps them within reach. It is well-constructed and easy to install. Safe and reliable.

Made of premium top-class PU and ABS material which is durable and is impact resistant. Interior velvet material increases friction to keep items from sliding and rattling.

From the brand

WOOD CITY Shut the Box Game

Shut the Box Game for Party, Family

About us

WOOD CITY aims to provide high-quality wooden early learning intelligence toys for all young children, by researching early childhood development, growth, practice.

We strive to achieve a collective vision of providing the best and up-to-date educational wooden toys for all young children, and commit to ensuring that they thrive and learn in a community where they reach their full potential and develop their intellect and imagination.

Shut the Box for 6 Players

Shut the Box for 4 Players

Fast Sling Puck Game

Upgraded Version for 6 Players: This shut the box game set designed for up to 6 players includes hexagonal game board lined with felt and completed with 1-10 numbers, instructions, 16 dice (12 colored, 4 original wood color). Kids and adults can enjoy the deal of strategy and luck and hours of fun while playing.
Learning While Playing: Simple math are required to play the shut-the-box dice game. Kids could improve basic mathematical addition skills, exercise logical thinking, problem solving abilities and enhance interpersonal communication and build good relationships with their friends. With gift box package design, this shut the box game set is a perfect gift for kids.
Blast Quick Game: No more time for a complicated game? Choose our wooden shut the box game. You can play a game for as long or as short a time as is available with 6 People. You can also customized rules to play more round.
Portable Traditional Game for Different Occasions: This 6-way close the box dice game is a portable and easy to carry wooden board game. It can be play in many different occasions, perfect for family, classroom, parties, pub etc. to have a great time with your family members, friends, classmates.
Premium Craftsmanship: The wooden shut the box game is made of solid natural wood which is durable and sturdy. Felt surface pad could reduce the noise when dice hit the board so that you can focus on the game. If you have any issues with our shut the box game, do not hesitate to get in touch with us and we will be more than happy to ensure you have a satisfying buying experience.

SHUT THE BOX GAME WOODEN for 6 PLAYERS

  • Shut the Box is a particular dice game, our upgraded version can be played up to 6 players.
  • The history of the game could be over 250 years and originated in Normandy.
  • In pubs, Shut the Box is traditionally played as a gambling game, but we dont advocate it generally.
  • Nowadays, it becomes a more and more popular board game during family activities, parties, and festivals.
  • Either for social and family entertainment or as an excellent tool for kids to learn math calculations.
  • The player rolls the dice, adds up the numbers, and then puts down the pieces that have the sum.
  • Enjoy the luck of the game as well as exercising the ability of divergent thinking to find more combinations.

PERFECT TABLETOP GAME

  • Whether it’s a game at a party to liven things up, or a bar gambling to punish the loser for drinking.
  • It can be both considered as our first choice of tool.
  • Portable, and can play with several friends at the same time to increase the play ability.
  • Not only are there various play rules, but also can through personal luck to create thrilling moments.
